stories.story: As an Admin, I want the system to be deployed on a secure VPS so that I can access the portal from anywhere
As an Admin, I want daily automated backups so that I don't lose critical business data
As an Admin, I want to view system health status so that I can proactively address issues
As a User, I want to log in with my email and password so that I can securely access the system
As a User, I want to reset my password via email so that I can regain access if I forget it
As an Admin, I want to create user accounts with specific roles so that I can control access to features
As an Admin, I want to deactivate user accounts so that former employees cannot access the system
As a User, I want my session to remain active for 24 hours so that I don't have to log in repeatedly
As an HR Manager, I want to add new employees with their personal and professional details so that I can maintain a complete employee database
As an HR Manager, I want to view and update employee information so that records remain current
As an HR Manager, I want to store employee statutory IDs (PAN, Aadhaar, UAN) so that compliance requirements are met
As an Employee, I want to view my profile so that I can verify my information is correct
As an Employee, I want to update my contact details so that the company can reach me
As an HR Manager, I want to mark employees as resigned or terminated so that their status is accurately reflected
As an HR Manager, I want to upload employee documents so that all records are centralized
As an Employee, I want to view my documents so that I can access them when needed
As an HR Manager, I want to categorize documents so that they are organized and searchable
As an HR Manager, I want to be notified when documents expire so that I can request renewals
As an Accountant, I want to access financial documents so that I can reference them for compliance
As an HR Manager, I want to create an onboarding checklist for new employees so that nothing is missed
As an HR Manager, I want to track onboarding task completion so that I know the progress
As a New Employee, I want to see my onboarding tasks so that I know what I need to complete
As an HR Manager, I want to receive reminders for pending onboarding tasks so that deadlines are met
As an Employee, I want to view my leave balance so that I know how many leaves I have
As an Employee, I want to apply for leave so that I can take time off
As an HR Manager, I want to approve or reject leave requests so that I can manage team availability
As an Employee, I want to be notified when my leave is approved or rejected so that I can plan accordingly
As an HR Manager, I want to configure leave policies so that accrual rules are automated
As an Employee, I want to view the company holiday calendar so that I can plan my leaves
As an HR Manager, I want leave data to integrate with payroll so that LOP is calculated correctly
As an Employee, I want to log my time against projects so that my work is tracked
As an Employee, I want to submit my weekly timesheet so that it can be approved
As an HR Manager, I want to approve timesheets so that hours are validated
As an Admin, I want to view timesheet reports so that I can track project utilization
As an Employee, I want to be reminded to submit my timesheet so that I don't miss deadlines
As an HR Manager, I want to configure salary structures so that CTC is broken down correctly
As an HR Manager, I want to run monthly payroll so that salaries are calculated
As an Employee, I want to view my payslip so that I understand my salary breakdown
As an Employee, I want to download my payslip as PDF so that I have a record
As an Accountant, I want payroll to calculate all statutory deductions so that compliance is ensured
As an HR Manager, I want to process salary revisions so that changes are reflected from effective date
As an Accountant, I want to generate bank transfer file so that salaries can be paid
As an Accountant, I want PF to be calculated automatically at 12% so that compliance is ensured
As an Accountant, I want EPS and EPF split to be calculated correctly so that contributions are accurate
As an Accountant, I want to generate ECR file so that I can upload to EPFO portal
As an Accountant, I want to be reminded of PF due dates so that I don't miss deadlines
As an Accountant, I want ESI to be calculated for eligible employees so that compliance is met
As an Accountant, I want ESI to be skipped for employees above wage limit so that rules are followed
As an Accountant, I want to generate ESI contribution report so that I can make payments
As an Accountant, I want PT to be deducted per Karnataka rules so that state compliance is met
As an Accountant, I want February PT to be Rs 300 so that annual total is correct
As an Accountant, I want TDS to be calculated using new tax regime so that compliance is current
As an Employee, I want to view my tax computation so that I understand my tax liability
As an Employee, I want to download Form 16 so that I can file my tax return
As an Accountant, I want TDS to be recalculated on salary revision so that projections are accurate
As an Accountant, I want to set up chart of accounts so that transactions can be categorized
As an Accountant, I want to create journal entries so that I can record transactions
As an Accountant, I want to view the general ledger so that I can see account activity
As an Accountant, I want to generate trial balance so that I can verify books are balanced
As an Admin, I want to close accounting periods so that past entries cannot be modified
As an Accountant, I want to maintain exchange rates so that foreign transactions are converted correctly
As an Accountant, I want to create invoices in USD/EUR so that I can bill international clients
As an Accountant, I want exchange gains/losses to be calculated so that accounts are accurate
As an Accountant, I want to create customer records so that I can invoice them
As an Accountant, I want to create invoices with GST so that I can bill customers
As an Accountant, I want to generate invoice PDF so that I can send to customers
As an Accountant, I want to record customer payments so that I can track receivables
As an Accountant, I want to view AR aging report so that I can follow up on overdue invoices
As an Admin, I want to send payment reminders so that collections improve
As an Accountant, I want to create vendor records so that I can record their bills
As an Accountant, I want to record vendor bills so that I can track payables
As an Accountant, I want to record vendor payments so that I can close bills
As an Accountant, I want to view AP aging report so that I can manage cash flow
As an Accountant, I want TDS to be calculated on vendor payments so that compliance is met
As an Accountant, I want to add bank accounts so that I can track transactions
As an Accountant, I want to import bank statements so that transactions are loaded
As an Accountant, I want to reconcile bank transactions so that books match bank
As an Accountant, I want auto-matching of transactions so that reconciliation is faster
As an Accountant, I want to generate bank reconciliation report so that I can verify accuracy
As an Accountant, I want GST to be calculated at 18% on invoices so that taxes are correct
As an Accountant, I want CGST/SGST split for intra-state so that returns are accurate
As an Accountant, I want to generate GSTR-1 report so that I can file returns
As an Accountant, I want to generate GSTR-3B report so that I can file summary return
As an Accountant, I want to calculate ITC from vendor bills so that credits are claimed
As an Accountant, I want to be reminded of GST due dates so that I don't miss filings
As an Accountant, I want to configure TDS sections so that deductions are calculated correctly
As an Accountant, I want TDS to be deducted on vendor payments so that compliance is met
As an Accountant, I want to generate Form 26Q so that I can file quarterly TDS returns
As an Accountant, I want to issue Form 16A to vendors so that they can claim TDS credit
As an Admin, I want to capture leads so that I can track potential clients
As an Admin, I want to update lead status so that I can track the sales pipeline
As an Admin, I want to convert leads to customers so that the transition is seamless
As an Admin, I want to log activities against leads so that I have a record of interactions
As an Admin, I want to create projects so that work can be tracked
As an HR Manager, I want to allocate employees to projects so that resources are assigned
As an Admin, I want to track project status so that I know progress
As an Admin, I want to view project profitability so that I can assess performance
As an Employee, I want to see my project assignments so that I know where to log time
As an Admin, I want AI to auto-execute high-confidence actions so that manual work is reduced
As an Accountant, I want AI to parse invoices so that data entry is automated
As an Accountant, I want AI to suggest transaction categorization so that accuracy improves
As an Admin, I want to review medium-confidence AI suggestions so that I can approve them
As an Admin, I want to track AI usage costs so that I can monitor expenses
As an Admin, I want to view Profit & Loss statement so that I can assess profitability
As an Admin, I want to view Balance Sheet so that I can see financial position
As an Accountant, I want to generate Trial Balance so that I can verify accuracy
As an HR Manager, I want to view payroll summary so that I can verify totals
As an External CA, I want to access financial reports so that I can verify compliance
As an Admin, I want to export reports to PDF and Excel so that I can share them
